#summary Replay header format
#labels Platform-PC,Game-Starcraft,Type-FileFormat

=Format=
{{{
u8		// Is Broodwar flag
u32		// Number of Frames
u8		// 	Unknown
u8		// 	Unknown
u8		// 	Unknown
u32		"Creation Date"
u8[12]		// Available Slots
char[28]	"Game Name"
u16		"Map Width"
u16		"Map Height"
u8		// 	Unknown (0x01)
u8		// Slots Available
u16		"Game Speed"
u16		"Game Type"
u16		"Game Subtype"
u32		// 	Unknown (Random Seed?)
u16		"Tileset"
u16		// 	Unknown ( x > 0 ) (0x01)
char[25]	// Creator Name
char[32]	// Map Name
u16		<GameTemplate>	    // Game Type ID
u16		<GameTemplate>	    // Subtype ID
u16		<GameTemplate>	    // Subtype Display Value
u16		<GameTemplate>	    // Subtype Label
u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Victory Conditions
                         0x00 = "Map Default";
                         0x01 = "Melee";
                         0x02 = "Highest Score";
                         0x03 = "Resources";
                         0x04 = "CTF";
                         0x05 = "Sudden Death";
                         0x06 = "Slaughter";
                         0x07 = "One on One";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Resources (type)
                         0x00 = "Map Default";
                         0x01 = "Fixed Value";
                         0x02 = "Low";
                         0x03 = "Medium";
                         0x04 = "High";
                         0x05 = "Income";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Unit Stats
                         0x00 = "Map Default";
                         0x01 = "Standard";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Fog of War
                         0x00 = "Off";
                         0x01 = "Warcraft1";
                         0x02 = "On";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Starting Units
                         0x00 = "Map Default";
                         0x01 = "Workers Only";
                         0x02 = "Workers and Center";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Starting Positions
                         0x00 = "Random";
                         0x01 = "Fixed";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Player Types (Flags)
                         0x01 = "Computer Players";
                         0x02 = "Single Player";

u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Allies allowed flag
u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Number of Teams
u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Cheat Codes allowed flag
u8		<GameTemplate>	    // Tournament Mode enabled flag
u32		<GameTemplate>	    // Victory Condition Value
u32		<GameTemplate>	    // Resources Value
u32		<GameTemplate>		// Unknown/unused
u8		// 	Unknown/unused

struct[12] //Player Structures (*12)
{
	u32		// Player ID
	u32		// Number of Actions
	u8		// Owner
	u8		// Race
	u8		// Force
	Char[25]	// Player Name
}

u32[8]		// Player Colour
u8[8]		// 	Unknown (0x01 if custom colour is used)
}}}
